meta.description: Hash Map dictionary for HealthBot keyword lookup

data.hello: Hello! I'm HealthBot. I can answer questions about safe sex, contraception, clinics, and more.
data.safe_sex: Safe sex means using protection (condoms), getting tested regularly, communicating with partners, and using contraception consistently.
data.contraception: Options include pills, IUDs, implants, condoms, and more. Talk to a clinician to find what's right for you.
data.clinic: Search online for sexual health clinics near you. Many offer confidential and affordable services. If it's urgent, go to the ER.
data.sti_testing: STI testing is important if you're sexually active. Many STIs are treatable. Get tested annually or after unprotected contact.
data.emergency: If it's an emergency, call your local emergency number or go to the nearest hospital immediately.
data.assessment: Check out the Self-Assessment section in the navigation to use our checklists.
data.mental_health: Sexual health includes mental well-being. Don't hesitate to seek therapy or counseling if needed.
